Module kivakit.security

Package com.telenav.kivakit.security.authentication.passwords

package com.telenav.kivakit.security.authentication.passwords
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    DigestPassword
    A message-digested password created with the Base64 encoder in *java.util*.
    PlainTextPassword
    A plain text password, which can be tested against a given password using PlainTextPassword.matches(Password).
    PlainTextPassword.Converter
    Converts passwords to and from Password objects.
